name: tabloom
description: Reusable React Native / Expo table primitives extracted from wooftech

scripts.build:example:dist: EXPO_NONINTERACTIVE=1 cd example && npx expo export --platform web --output-dir ../dist
scripts.lint: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false npx eslint src spec scripts
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "Bump version to %s" && git push --follow-tags && npm whoami || npm login && npm publish
scripts.test:dist: npm run build:example:dist && SYSTEM_TEST_HOST=dist npm test
